mapper.insert: INSERT INTO survey (uid, title, description, type, create_time, update_time, time_limit) VALUES (#{uid}, #{title}, #{description}, #{type,typeHandler=org.example.handler.type.SurveyTypeHandler}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{timeLimit})
mapper.select: SELECT sid, uid, title, description, type, create_time, update_time, open_time, fill_num, time_limit FROM survey WHERE uid = #{userId} and state != 'delete' ORDER BY ${orderBy} DESC
